item.title: [pi] help pleas3! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:3, topic:378372”]Open ClickingButtons.java and search for “case 54104:”
Something like

			case 54104: //Farming
				SkillGuides.farmingInterface(c);
				break;

should come up. Unless it’s exion, it would say something like “My Farming level is blah blah blah.”
Right under that type in what you want it to do.
c.AddItem probably wouldn’t work, so you could use something like “c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, AMOUNT);” instead.

Your code would be

case 28174: c.getItems().addItem(9075, 50); c.getItems().addItem(651, 50); c.getItems().addItem(758, 50); break;[/quote]SWEET! Thank You Alot!!!
Okay Now, I Got This Left To Edit.

Player Status: Member Status: Pk Points: IQ Points:

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] help pleas3! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Open ClickingButtons.java and search for “case 54104:”
Something like

			case 54104: //Farming
				SkillGuides.farmingInterface(c);
				break;

should come up. Unless it’s exion, it would say something like “My Farming level is blah blah blah.”
Right under that type in what you want it to do.
c.AddItem probably wouldn’t work, so you could use something like “c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, AMOUNT);” instead.

Your code would be

case 28174: c.getItems().addItem(9075, 50); c.getItems().addItem(651, 50); c.getItems().addItem(758, 50); break;

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] help pleas3! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay Guys Listen I Am Editing My Quest Tab, I Changed The Names To How I Want Them, Just Adding The Shit To Make Them Work I Just Need Alittle Help Adding Shit Lol… Please And Thank You.

PlayerAssistant.java File Codes, (How The Quest Tab Looks)

c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Player Status: ", 7332); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Member Status: ", 7333); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Pk Points: ", 7334); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@IQP: ", 7336); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@-", 7383); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Home", 7339); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Barrows", 7338); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Thieving", 7340); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Ice Queen", 7346); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Pest Control", 7341); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Fighters Pit", 7342); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@-", 7337); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@-", 7343); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Super Pots", 7335); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Barrage Runes", 7344); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Vengeance Runes", 7345); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@-", 7347); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@-", 7348);
I Got All The Teleport Ones Down Pat, Can Someone Help Me With The Code For: Super Pots, Barrage Runes, Vengeance Runes?
My Idea Of All This Was:

case 28174: c.AddItem 9075, 50; c.AddItem 651, 50; c.AddItem 758, 50; break;
Only Got A Few Errors Though, Can Some1 Correct It?
